code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{connectPresence,onPresenceUpdate}from"../utils/presenceSocket";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function UserStatusIndicator(_ref){let{username}=_ref;const[status,setStatus]=useState("offline");useEffect(()=>{connectPresence(data=>{if(data.user===username){setStatus(data.status);}});onPresenceUpdate(data=>{if(data.user===username){setStatus(data.status);}});},[username]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center gap-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-3 h-3 rounded-full ".concat(status==="online"?"bg-green-500":"bg-gray-400")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-sm text-gray-700",children:username})]});}
